publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6365 Claire Baker: Congratulations to Fife PC Barry Seago for a Unique Double Award from the Scottish Police College—That the Parliament congratulates Fife Road Policing Officer PC Barry Seago for his unique achievement in winning both the Blackhall Trophy for the best academic achievement of 2009 and the Alan McMurray trophy for the best mechanical student of 2009 at a ceremony at the Scottish Police College; notes that PC Seago is the first officer in Scotland to have been awarded the prizes in the same year, and believes that PC Seago’s efforts contribute to and highlight the talent and commitment shown by officers at Fife Constabulary under the leadership of Chief Constable Norma Graham.
